text: læa chaw yiw læa chaw khrist nan ca mi yindi kæ cea (muhammad) penxankhad cnkwa cea ca ptibati tam sasna khxng phwk khea cng klaw theid thæcring kha næana khx ngxallxh theanan khux kha næana nænxn tha cea ptibati tam khwam khır khxng phwk khea hlangcak thi mi khwam ru mayang læw k yxm mimi phu khumkhrxng læa phu chwyhelux dı «sahrab cea hı phn cak kar lngthosʹ khx ngxallxh di
